title: Sidewall, "Magnolia Grove", 1940
provenance: Used in hall, "Magnolia Grove", Greensboro, Alabama. Birthplace of Rear Admiral Richard P. Hobson.
description: Stylized and symmetrical pattern. Bouquet of flowers in an urn, all enclosed in a medallion. Field is covered with small quatrefoil florets. Entire paper is embossed with fine parallel horizontal lines. Printed in shades of gray on ivory ground.
